isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - COWL TRAY

svcproc.title: COWL TRAY
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 84 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If cowl tray (Item 1) was removed with cowl tray drain tube (Item 2) attached and cowl tray drain tube was positioned behind air cleaner (Item 3) mounting bracket, as was noted when removing cowl tray with cowl tray drain tube attached. Refer to Figure 84 for proper routing of cowl tray drain tube. If cowl tray drain tube was removed from cowl tray, install cowl tray drain tube onto bottom of cowl tray, then squeeze drain tube clamp (Item 4) and slide it back into place.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 83 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With cowl tray (Item 1) positioned at engine side of dash panel, on passenger side install windshield washer hose (Item 3) with grommet (Item 2) from windshield washer bottle through hole in cowl tray. Pull windshield washer hose through cowl tray until grommet is at the hole and install grommet into cowl tray.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: On standard 5000 i and 9000 i models, install cowl tray (Item 4) as follows:

step2.para: Position air intake screen (Item 8) and cowl tray (Item 4) in place at air duct inlet (Item 9). Align mounting holes in air intake screen and cowl tray with air duct inlet threaded holes. Install four hex flanged bolts (Item 7) through air intake screen, cowl tray and into air duct inlet threaded holes. Do not tighten until cowl tray is secured to engine side of dash panel.
Position cowl tray (Item 4) against engine side of dash panel and install four hex flanged bolts (Item 6) and tighten.
Tighten four hex flanged bolts (Item 7) into air duct inlet threaded holes securing air intake screen (Item 8) and cowl tray (Item 4) to air duct inlet (Item 9).
Install windshield washer hose (Item 2) from windshield washer bottle onto tee fitting (Item 5) of windshield washer hose assembly.
Install windshield washer hoses (Items 1 and 2) into three retaining clips (Item 3) on the cowl tray (Item 4).

Install windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: On 5000 i and 9000 i models with external air cleaners, install cowl tray (Item 10) as follows:

step2.para: Position cowl tray (Item 10) against engine side of dash panel and install four hex flanged bolts (Item 6) and tighten.
Install windshield washer hose (Item 2) from windshield washer bottle onto tee fitting (Item 5) of windshield washer hose assembly.
Install windshield washer hoses (Items 1 and 2) into three retaining clips (Item 3) on the cowl tray (Item 10).

Install windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: On 5000 i models with a butterfly hood, install cowl tray (Item 11) as follows:

step2.para: Position cowl tray (Item 11) at engine side of dash panel and align three holes in the back of the cowl tray with three threaded studs (Item 14) on engine side of dash panel. Push cowl tray over threaded studs and against engine side of dash panel.

Position rear hood hinge retainer bracket (Item 13) over the three threaded studs (Item 14) and install three hex lock nuts and flat washers (Item 12) securing rear hood hinge retainer bracket to cowl tray (Item 11).

Position air intake screen (Item 8) and cowl tray (Item 11) in place at air duct inlet (Item 9). Align mounting holes in air intake screen and cowl tray with air duct inlet threaded holes. Install four hex flanged bolts (Item 7) through air intake screen, cowl tray and into air duct inlet threaded holes. Do not tighten until cowl tray is secured to engine side of dash panel.
Position cowl tray (Item 11) against engine side of dash panel and install four hex flanged bolts (Item 6) and tighten.
Tighten four hex flanged bolts (Item 7) into air duct inlet threaded holes securing air intake screen (Item 8) and cowl tray (Item 11) to air duct inlet (Item 9).
Install windshield washer hose (Item 2) from windshield washer bottle onto tee fitting (Item 5) of windshield washer hose assembly.
Install windshield washer hoses (Items 1 and 2) into three retaining clips (Item 3) on the cowl tray (Item 11).

Install windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
, Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly.
Install butterfly hood after installing the cowl tray and windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies. Refer to GROUP 09 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS in the Master Service Manual.
